ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.NotificationArtifacts

Class NotificationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.NotificationArtifacts.NotificationHandler

  • public class NotificationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by spack on 2018-02-23. NotificationHandler deals with the creation of objects of the Notification Type. essentially A middle man to communicate with the Factories. Currently I am using Users as parameters, I can change this to UserIDs pretty easily if we think thats a good idea, I just was not sure the best way to integrate that with the data manager so I kept it simple.

    • Method Detail

      • newSimpleNotification

        public SimpleNotification newSimpleNotification(Status status,
                                                java.lang.String taskname,
                                                User taskrequestor,
                                                User taskprovider)
        This method is called to create notifications based on bidding, and assigning tasks.
        Parameters:
        status - the current status of the task the notification will be based on. Depending on this status the body of the notification will change.
        taskname - the name of the task the notification is related to.
        taskrequestor - the taskrequestor who posted the task
        taskprovider - the taskprovider who interacts with the task
        Returns:
        This Function will return a notification object

      • newRatingNotification

        public java.util.ArrayList<RatingNotification> newRatingNotification(java.lang.String taskname,
                                                                     User taskrequestor,
                                                                     User taskprovider)
        This method is called to create rating notifications sent to both parties upon a tasks completion
        Parameters:
        taskname - the name of the task the notification is related to.
        taskrequestor - the taskrequestor who posted the task
        taskprovider - the taskprovider who interacts with the task
        Returns:
        This function contains an arraylist of two notifications, one to be sent to the task requestor and one to the task provider
